Reviews.Title: Great light-weight notebook
Reviews.Author: Upharia
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop in need of a light weight computer that would run all of my programs for college. I wasn't looking for a powerful or super-fast PC. With that being said, this computer fits the bill. I have had it for just over a month and have really enjoyed learning windows 8.A few thoughts that I've noticed:-one time the touchscreen froze with the little touch "dot" stuck on the screen. I had to restart when this happened. It has only happened once so far.-this computer is very light (just under 3 lbs) and I was afraid the charger would be a huge, heavy thing like my old laptop. I was surprised to see that the charger is tiny and lightweight as well.-once you have a touchscreen laptop you will forever try to touch every screen even when it's not a touchscreen.-this computer is not super-fast. Sometimes it doesn't load flash-filled or complex sites very fast. It's not anything that has been a hindrance to me (I don't game or web surf except it school).-this laptop looks and feels amazing. The brushed aluminum keeps the exterior cool. This laptop never gets hot. (I had to sit with it in my lap for 4 hours and it was barely warm)- the screen has a lot I glare. I just got an anti glare protector. Problem solved.

Reviews.Title: Takes the worry out of portability.
Reviews.Author: Patricia Bynoe
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent tool for my projects. It looks really attractive, I got the portability and ease of use  found in a tablet and I have the power and function of a lap-top computer. I am now able to interact anyhow I please with my Asus Vivobook. Because of it's size, I can carry it very easily in my regular shoulder bag without bulk or weight. Downside: I am trying to get over the limitations of the tablet function on a laptop; trying to figure out how to find everything and make them work. I suppose  Windows 8 OS is partly to blame for my difficulties. All-in-all I expect it will serve me well.

Integrated 802.11 b/g/n - USB 3.0 - HDMI - Built-in BluetoothTM V4.0 - Black
HD Web Camera - Windows 8 - 1 YR Global ASUS Warranty
ProductInfo.Name: Asus VivoBook X202E-DH51T 11.6" Touchscreen LED Notebook Computer, Intel Core i5-3317U 1.7GHz, 4GB DDR3 RAM, 500GB HDD, Windows 8 Home Premium
